models

Class Tower

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.Tower
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawableEntity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Tower_Fire, Tower_IceBeam, Tower_Laser, Tower_SpreadShot

    public abstract class Tower
extends java.lang.Object
implements DrawableEntity
    The Tower Class. It defines the basic attributes and draws the tower. Fire, icebeam and laser tower extends this class. Set the basic info for Towers
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    HaoZhang, Meng Yao

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        The method to convert the characteristics of a tower to a string. Its format of output is $towerName$ Tower, Level: $level$ /$MAXTOWERLEVEL$ Attack range: $attackRange$, Damage: $Damage$.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
